title: Spotify update brings expanded controls to collaborative playlists
content:
For those who like to create custom playlists with friends on Spotify, collaborative playlists have been a crucial feature on the platform. This week, Spotify is updating the feature to add new levels of control for playlist creators.

moreâ€¦

The post Spotify update brings expanded controls to collaborative playlists appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This week, Spotify is updating its collaborative playlists feature to add new levels of control for shared mixes.
